Tags API

标签的增、删、改、查

获取标签列表

GET /api/v1/tags

Parameters

Name Description
category 标签类型，可能的值有："expenses"、"income"

Response Fields

Name Description
data[id] id
data[user_id] 用户id
data[name] 标签名
data[category] 标签类型，可能的值有："expenses"、"income"
data[deleted] 是否删除
data[emoji] 标签符号
data[created_at] 创建时间
data[deleted_at] 删除时间
data[updated_at] 更新时间时间

Request

Headers

Version: HTTP/1.0
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjozNTUsImV4cCI6MTY2MzMxODY2Mn0.WSP0MMGHF_ErffUGroPo--9oUzAdtqnOPeG6TRHcAQk
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:

Route

GET /api/v1/tags?category=expenses

Query Parameters

category: expenses

Response

Headers

X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-XSS-Protection: 0
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Download-Options: noopen
X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Vary: Accept, Accept-Encoding, Origin
ETag: W/"2c8a718aa6dec0902bbd86e5a48affb6"
Cache-Control: max-age=0, private, must-revalidate
X-Request-Id: 9477721a-0a42-43f4-badb-d7394ef4a8f1
X-Runtime: 0.003027
Content-Length: 1902

Status

200 OK
